name: Season of Harvest
description:
Season of Harvest

It's harvest season again. Soon the humans will come to these fields to pull all of our friends out of the ground to eat them. We cannot let this happen! This year we will fight back!

Play as the crops during harvest season and run away from the people coming to harvest you. Use the power of corn to push objects around and delay your fate by gaining points with sunflowers.

  • An arcade puzzel game
  • Push and move plants around to avoid getting harvested
  • Every sunflower you grow gets you points. How many points can you get before all sunflowers are harvested?

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 52.
